      • getClickUrlRule

        int getClickUrlRule()
        The rule for the search. Valid values are:
        • KKConstants.SEARCH_EXACT
        • KKConstants.SEARCH_ADD_WILDCARD_BEFORE
        • KKConstants.SEARCH_ADD_WILDCARD_AFTER
        • KKConstants.SEARCH_ADD_WILDCARD_BEFORE_AND_AFTER
        • KKConstants.SEARCH_USE_GLOBAL_CONFIG
        Returns:
        the clickUrlRule

      • setClickUrlRule

        void setClickUrlRule(int clickUrlRule)
        The rule for the search. Valid values are:
        • KKConstants.SEARCH_EXACT
        • KKConstants.SEARCH_ADD_WILDCARD_BEFORE
        • KKConstants.SEARCH_ADD_WILDCARD_AFTER
        • KKConstants.SEARCH_ADD_WILDCARD_BEFORE_AND_AFTER
        • KKConstants.SEARCH_USE_GLOBAL_CONFIG
        Parameters:
        clickUrlRule - the clickUrlRule to set

      • getDescriptionText

        java.lang.String getDescriptionText()
        Returns:
        the descriptionText

      • setDescriptionText

        void setDescriptionText(java.lang.String descriptionText)
        Search for records containing this text in any of the following AdminContentDescription fields: name1, name2, name3, name4, title, and content.
        Parameters:
        descriptionText - the descriptionText to set

      • getDescriptionTextRule

        int getDescriptionTextRule()
        Returns:
        the descriptionTextRule

      • setDescriptionTextRule

        void setDescriptionTextRule(int descriptionTextRule)
        Search for records containing this text in any of the ContentDescription fields (such as name1, name2, title, content fields). The rule for the search. Valid values are:
        • KKConstants.SEARCH_EXACT
        • KKConstants.SEARCH_ADD_WILDCARD_BEFORE
        • KKConstants.SEARCH_ADD_WILDCARD_AFTER
        • KKConstants.SEARCH_ADD_WILDCARD_BEFORE_AND_AFTER
        • KKConstants.SEARCH_USE_GLOBAL_CONFIG
        Parameters:
        descriptionTextRule - the descriptionTextRule to set

      • isRetrieveDescriptions

        Returns:

        Parameters:
        retrieveDescriptions - the retrieveDescriptions to set

      • isEvaluateExpressions

        boolean isEvaluateExpressions()
        Returns:
        the evaluateExpressions

      • setEvaluateExpressions

        void setEvaluateExpressions(boolean evaluateExpressions)
        Set this to true to evaluate expressions on content. Only content where expressions evaluate to true will be returned. By default expressions are NOT evaluated.
        Parameters:
        evaluateExpressions - the evaluateExpressions to set
